00031 #define EagleSynchronizer_Lock(lock) { \
00032     EagleWorker *currentWorker = EagleWorker_GetForCurrentThread(); \
00033     uint64_t start = EagleUtils_GetAbsoluteTime();\
00034     pthread_mutex_lock(&(lock)->mutex); \
00035     if(NULL != currentWorker) { \
00036         currentWorker->lockTime += EagleUtils_GetAbsoluteTime() - start;\
00037     } \
